package.name: quotes
package.author: WhistlingZephyr
package.description: Include different quotations and quotation-related characters to espanso.
package.title: Quotes

manifest.author: WhistlingZephyr
manifest.description: Include different quotations and quotation-related characters to espanso.
manifest.name: quotes
manifest.title: Quotes

value.readme:
# Quotes
Type different type of quotes from many languages using [espanso](https://espanso.org). It replaces keywords like `:'[` with `„Äå`. Keep reading for more details.

## Installation
Install the package with
```sh
espanso install quotes
```

## Usage
This package replaces the listed keywords with listed quotes while typing.


| Shortcut | Character | Description
|-|-|-
| ``` :--- ``` | ‚Äï | horizontal bar
| ``` :--. ``` | ‚Äî | em dash
| ``` :-. ``` | ‚Äì | en dash
| ``` :"< ``` | ¬´ | left-pointing double angle quotation mark
| ``` :"> ``` | ¬ª | right-pointing double angle quotation mark
| ``` :'' ``` | ‚Äò | left single quotation mark
| ``` :', ``` | ‚Äô | right single quotation mark
| ``` :'_, ``` | ‚Äö | single low-9 quotation mark
| ``` :'` ``` | ‚Äõ | single high-reversed-9 quotation mark
| ``` :"' ``` | ‚Äú | left double quotation mark
| ``` :", ``` | ‚Äù | right double quotation mark
| ``` :"_, ``` | ‚Äû | double low-9 quotation mark
| ``` :"` ``` | ‚Äü | double high-reversed-9 quotation mark
| ``` :'< ``` | ‚Äπ | single left-pointing angle quotation mark
| ``` :'> ``` | ‚Ä∫ | single right-pointing angle quotation mark
| ``` :"_` ``` | ‚πÇ | double low-reversed-9 quotation mark
| ``` :^[ ``` | ‚åú | top left corner
| ``` :^] ``` | ‚åù | top right corner
| ``` :'*' ``` | ‚ùõ | heavy single turned comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :'*, ``` | ‚ùú | heavy single comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"*' ``` | ‚ùù | heavy double turned comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :", ``` | ‚ùû | heavy double comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"!' ``` | üô∂ | sans-serif heavy double turned comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"!, ``` | üô∑ | sans-serif heavy double comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :"!_, ``` | üô∏ | sans-serif heavy low double comma quotation mark ornament
| ``` :.: ``` | ‚†¥ | braille pattern dots-236
| ``` ::. ``` | ‚†¶ | braille pattern dots-356
| ``` :'[ ``` | „Äå | left corner bracket
| ``` :'] ``` | „Äç | right corner bracket
| ``` :"[ ``` | „Äé | left white corner bracket
| ``` :"] ``` | „Äè | right white corner bracket
| ``` :`` ``` | „Äù | reversed double prime quotation mark
| ``` :`, ``` | „Äû | double prime quotation mark
| ``` :`_` ``` | „Äü | low double prime quotation mark
| ``` :'^[ ``` | ÔπÅ | presentation form for vertical left corner bracket
| ``` :'^] ``` | ÔπÇ | presentation form for vertical right corner bracke
| ``` :"^[ ``` | ÔπÉ | presentation form for vertical left white corner bracket
| ``` :"^] ``` | ÔπÑ | presentation form for vertical right white corner bracket
| ``` :"" ``` | ÔºÇ | fullwidth quotation mark
| ``` :'" ``` | Ôºá | fullwidth apostrophe
| ``` :'_[ ``` | ÔΩ¢ | halfwidth left corner bracket
| ``` :'_] ``` | ÔΩ£  | halfwidth right corner bracket
| ``` :"+< ``` | „Ää | left double angle brackets korean
| ``` :"+> ``` | „Äã | right double angle brackets korean
| ``` :'+< ``` | „Äà | left single angle brackets korean
| ``` :'+> ``` | „Äâ | right single angle brackets korean


## Related
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quotation_mark

packageYml.name: package.yml
packageYml.content:
matches:
  # horizontal bar
  - trigger: ":---"
    replace: "‚Äï"
  # em dash
  - trigger: ":--."
    replace: "‚Äî"
  # en dash
  - trigger: ":-."
    replace: "‚Äì"
  # left-pointing double angle quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\"<"
    replace: "¬´"
  # right-pointing double angle quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\">"
    replace: "¬ª"
  # left single quotation mark
  - trigger: ":''"
    replace: "‚Äò"
  # right single quotation mark
  - trigger: ":',"
    replace: "‚Äô"
  # single low-9 quotation mark
  - trigger: ":'_,"
    replace: "‚Äö"
  # single high-reversed-9 quotation mark
  - trigger: ":'`"
    replace: "‚Äõ"
  # left double quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\"'"
    replace: "‚Äú"
  # right double quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\","
    replace: "‚Äù"
  # double low-9 quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\"_,"
    replace: "‚Äû"
  # double high-reversed-9 quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\"`"
    replace: "‚Äü"
  # single left-pointing angle quotation mark
  - trigger: ":'<"
    replace: "‚Äπ"
  # single right-pointing angle quotation mark
  - trigger: ":'>"
    replace: "‚Ä∫"
  # double low-reversed-9 quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\"_`"
    replace: "‚πÇ"
  # top left corner
  - trigger: ":^["
    replace: "‚åú"
  # top right corner
  - trigger: ":^]"
    replace: "‚åù"
  # heavy single turned comma quotation mark ornament
  - trigger: ":'*'"
    replace: "‚ùõ"
  # heavy single comma quotation mark ornament
  - trigger: ":'*,"
    replace: "‚ùú"
  # heavy double turned comma quotation mark ornament
  - trigger: ":\"*'"
    replace: "‚ùù"
  # heavy double comma quotation mark ornament
  - trigger: ":\","
    replace: "‚ùû"
  # sans-serif heavy double turned comma quotation mark ornament
  - trigger: ":\"!'"
    replace: "üô∂"
  # sans-serif heavy double comma quotation mark ornament
  - trigger: ":\"!,"
    replace: "üô∑"
  # sans-serif heavy low double comma quotation mark ornament
  - trigger: ":\"!_,"
    replace: "üô∏"
  # braille pattern dots-236
  - trigger: ":.:"
    replace: "‚†¥"
  # braille pattern dots-356
  - trigger: "::."
    replace: "‚†¶"
  # left corner bracket
  - trigger: ":'["
    replace: "„Äå"
  # right corner bracket
  - trigger: ":']"
    replace: "„Äç"
  # left white corner bracket
  - trigger: ":\"["
    replace: "„Äé"
  # right white corner bracket
  - trigger: ":\"]"
    replace: "„Äè"
  # reversed double prime quotation mark
  - trigger: ":``"
    replace: "„Äù"
  # double prime quotation mark
  - trigger: ":`,"
    replace: "„Äû"
  # low double prime quotation mark
  - trigger: ":`_`"
    replace: "„Äü"
  # presentation form for vertical left corner bracket
  - trigger: ":'^["
    replace: "ÔπÅ"
  # presentation form for vertical right corner bracke
  - trigger: ":'^]"
    replace: "ÔπÇ"
  # presentation form for vertical left white corner bracket
  - trigger: ":\"^["
    replace: "ÔπÉ"
  # presentation form for vertical right white corner bracket
  - trigger: ":\"^]"
    replace: "ÔπÑ"
  # fullwidth quotation mark
  - trigger: ":\"\""
    replace: "ÔºÇ"
  # fullwidth apostrophe
  - trigger: ":'\""
    replace: "Ôºá"
  # halfwidth left corner bracket
  - trigger: ":'_["
    replace: "ÔΩ¢"
  # halfwidth right corner bracket
  - trigger: ":'_]"
    replace: "ÔΩ£ "
  # left double angle brackets korean
  - trigger: ":\"+<"
    replace: "„Ää"
  # right double angle brackets korean
  - trigger: ":\"+>"
    replace: "„Äã"
  # left single angle brackets korean
  - trigger: ":'+<"
    replace: "„Äà"
  # right single angle brackets korean
  - trigger: ":'+>"
    replace: "„Äâ"
